Name: 三国模拟器 Three Kingdoms Simulator
About the game: This is a historical simulator also an arpg game in A.D.200 china.In an open world of tens of cities, you can choose your friend your enemy your leader or be a leader. You can choose which city or who to attack, you can choose what task to do. There is no main task line and no many stories, you are free here.You can stand by or involve in the unified process of this country. You can marry a wife and give birth also can your children.In battle you will be able to stand by thousands of soldiers and use powerful skill. Uniting the country is a goal of game but not the only one, you can for example make creating a big family as a goal .So , every time you play you may feel different. Features: Back to age before Battle of GuanDu,start your journey from here Player and over 200 npcs share a same big map Almost Every Npc Has An Ai In Battlefield Almost Every Soldier Can Be Seen Get married and make friends to live a better life In this world learn skills from friend and enhance them to become a star in the world
